items.title: Comparing Collaborative Visualization Behaviors in Desktop and Augmented Reality Environments
items.description: A novel method for quantitatively measuring communication and task space overlap with AR HDMs, and demonstration in accompanying user study.

items.title: Exploring the Impact of Augmented Reality on Collaborative Decision-Making in Small Teams
items.description: A Master's Thesis presenting a user study exploring how dyads (two-person pairs) collaborate differently in AR vs using a traditional desktop.
